content.query:
select DISTINCT DateID from Trip ORDER by DateID

select count(*) as count, DateID from Trip group by DateID ORDER by DateID

CREATE SCHEMA test1110

CREATE TABLE test1110.Trip_2Partition
WITH
(
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX,
    DISTRIBUTION = HASH(MedallionID),
    PARTITION
    (
        DateID RANGE RIGHT FOR VALUES
        (
        20130701
        )
    )
)
AS SELECT * FROM dbo.Trip;

drop external table test1115_export

select top 1 * from openrowset (
    bulk 'https://dlsginatest.blob.core.windows.net/users/CETAS/RamzTest/testforgina.parquet',
    FORMAT='PARQUET'
) 
--with (TENANTID AS CAST(filepath(1) as NVARCHAR(1000)))
as r
where r.YearWeekInt = '202239'


create external TABLE test1115_export
--(
--YearWeekInt int not null,
--TCOTCEXT char(11) not null
--)
WITH 
(   
    LOCATION = 'CETAS/RamzTest/testforgina.parquet',
    DATA_SOURCE = test0921_Export,  
    FILE_FORMAT = eff_pq
)

select top 1 * from test1115_export

create TABLE test1110.Ramz1115
(	YearWeekInt int not null,
	TCOTCExt char(11) not null
)
with (
DISTRIBUTION = HASH( [TCOTCExt] )
, CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
, PARTITION (YearWeekInt RANGE RIGHT FOR VALUES (<2438 partition values>))
ï¼‰
as select * from test1115_export

CREATE TABLE test1110.Trip_12Partition
WITH
(
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX,
    DISTRIBUTION = HASH(MedallionID),
    PARTITION
    (
        DateID RANGE RIGHT FOR VALUES
        (
        20130201,20130301,20130401,20130501,20130601,20130701,20130801,20130901,20131001,20131101,20131201
        )
    )
)
AS SELECT * FROM dbo.Trip;

select count(*) from test1110.Trip_2Partition where DateID >= 20131201

select count(*) from test1110.Trip_12Partition where DateID >= 20131201

--first run: 2022-11-15 12:42 UTC 26s
--then 2s
SELECT count(*) FROM dbo.test1115_auto WHERE YearWeekInt = 202101

--first run: 2022-11-15 12:43 UTC 13s
--then 2s
SELECT count(*) FROM dbo.test1115_2partition WHERE YearWeekInt = 202101
